Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.common.side

Class CLISideRepresentation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.cli.rendering.common.side.CLISideRepresentation
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLILargeSideRepresentation, CLISmallSideRepresentation
public abstract class CLISideRepresentation extends Object
Represents a side of a card in the CLI-rendered game field.
